title: Execution DAG
description: Directed acyclic graph of tasks for Phase 4 pipeline execution. Built by orchestrator from plan_output.json work_streams. Serves as both execution plan and live state tracker.

lang.description: Primary language detected. 'multi' for fullstack with different backend/frontend languages.

pre_execution_sha.description: Git HEAD SHA before any Phase 4 execution began. Baseline for all diffs.

type.description: Node kind. 'agent' = Task tool invocation, 'commit' = git-safe-commit, 'verify' = validation script, 'gate' = user decision point.

status.description: 'ready' = all dependencies met, eligible for launch. Orchestrator transitions pendingâ†’ready when deps complete.

stream.description: Which work stream this node belongs to (e.g., 'backend', 'frontend'). Null for cross-stream nodes.

model.description: Model to use for this agent invocation.

task_id.description: Background Task ID assigned when status transitions to 'running'. Used for TaskOutput polling.

pre_sha.description: Git HEAD SHA recorded just before this node started. Used by reality check.

output_file.description: Path to the node's output file (e.g., 'backend_completion.json').

verify_schema.description: Schema name to validate output against (e.g., 'stream_completion'). Used by verify nodes.

timeout_minutes.description: Max minutes before node is considered hung.

attempt.description: Current attempt number. Incremented on retry.

max_attempts.description: Maximum retry attempts before escalating to user.

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when node execution began.

completed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when node execution finished.

edges.description: Dependency edges. 'from' must complete before 'to' can transition to 'ready'.

to.description: Target node ID (blocked until source completes).
